query_text: Parts and accessories designed for specific controlled items or defense products.

query_text: Operates from >31.8 GHz up to 37 GHz, delivering at least 0.1 nW (-70 dBm) peak power.
source_ecn_description: Rated for operation with a peak saturated power output greater than 0.1n W (−70 dBm) at any frequency exceeding 31.8 GHz up to and including 37 GHz;

query_text: GFCI
source_ecn_description: Ground fault circuit interrupters;

query_text: Perfluoroamines
source_ecn_description: Perfluoroalkylamines;

query_text: Incoming and outgoing air is HEPA filtered.
source_ecn_description: Supply and exhaust air to and from the workspace is high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filtered.

query_text: Helicopter folding systems for tails, stabilators, and automatic rotor blades, plus related parts.
source_ecn_description: Tail boom folding systems, stabilator folding systems or automatic rotor blade folding systems, and specially designed parts and components therefor;

query_text: Drum mag
source_ecn_description: A drum magazine;

query_text: Diethyl chlorophosphite
source_ecn_description: (C.A.S. #589-57-1) Diethyl chlorophosphite;

query_text: Non-phenolic resin or pitch with a DMA Tg of 232°C (505K) or higher.
source_ecn_description: Dynamic Mechanical Analysis glass transition temperature (DMA Tg)' equal to or exceeding 505 K (232 °C) and having a resin or pitch, not specified by 1C008 or 1C009.b, and not being a phenolic resin;
Curium 242;

query_text: Inorganic chemicals from Naval Petroleum Reserves (NPR), or made available by trades involving NPR goods.
source_ecn_description: Inorganic chemicals listed in Supplement No. 1 to part 754 of the EAR that were produced or derived from the Naval Petroleum Reserves (NPR) or became available for export as a result of an exchange of any NPR produced or derived commodities.

query_text: Digital engine controls for gas turbine engines.
source_ecn_description: Digital engine control systems (e.g., Full Authority Digital Engine Controls (FADEC) and Digital Electronic Engine Controls (DEEC)) "specially designed" for gas turbine engines controlled in this ECCN; or

query_text: Spacecraft payloads.
source_ecn_description: Primary, secondary, or hosted payloads that perform a function of ECCN 9A515.a.1, .a.2, .a.3, or .a.4 “spacecraft.”

query_text: TEPAN (HX-879), a cyanoethylated polyamine.
source_ecn_description: TEPAN (HX-879) (tetraethylenepentaamineacrylonitrile) (CAS 68412-45-3); cyanoethylated polyamines and their salts (MT for TEPAN (HX-879));

query_text: Specialized software for developing or producing advanced electronic components.
source_ecn_description: ``Software'', not specified elsewhere, ``specially designed'' or modified for the ``development'' or ``production'' of items specified in ECCN 3A901.b, 3B903, or 3B904.

query_text: Stretches over 8%.
source_ecn_description: An elongation exceeding 8%.

query_text: Stays accurate within 1,250 ppm for a full year.
source_ecn_description: A “scale factor” “repeatability” of less (better) than 1,250 ppm over a period of one year; or

query_text: C. burnetii
source_ecn_description: Coxiella burnetii;

query_text: Tight 0.1 nm FWHI bandwidth (or better) and 50%+ transmission.
source_ecn_description: Bandwidths equal to or less than 0.1 nm FWHI and peak transmission of 50% or more;

query_text: Takes a bayonet
source_ecn_description: Ability to accept a bayonet;

query_text: Specialized focal plane arrays.
source_ecn_description: "Focal plane arrays" having the characteristics listed in 6A002.a.3; or

query_text: Tuners for specific equipment.
source_ecn_description: Tuners specially designed for systems and equipment in paragraphs (a)(4) and (b) of this category;

query_text: Tools and software needed to design, make, operate, and repair specific products and programs.
source_ecn_description: “Technology” “required” for the “development,” “production,” operation, installation, maintenance, repair, overhaul, or refurbishing of commodities controlled by 0A602 or 0B602, or “software” controlled by 0D602 as follows (see List of Items Controlled).

query_text: Steerable, focused electron beam.
source_ecn_description: A deflected focused electron beam; and

query_text: Automatically fine-tunes your build parameters, path, or equipment settings during the process, using real-time data from internal monitoring.
source_ecn_description: A closed loop control system designed to modify the consolidation source parameters, build path, or equipment settings during the build cycle in response to feedback from `in-process monitoring' equipment specified in 2B910.c.

query_text: Materials: types d, e, or f
source_ecn_description: Materials controlled by 1C008.d to 1C008.f; or

query_text: Grow chambers you can clean right where they are.
source_ecn_description: Cultivation chambers designed to be sterilized or disinfected in situ;

query_text: High-precision GNSS receiver for long-range, heavy-payload drones, rockets, and missiles.
source_ecn_description: GNSS receiving equipment specially designed for use with rockets, missiles, SLVs, drones, or unmanned air vehicle systems capable of delivering at least a 500 kg payload to a range of at least 300 km (MT);

query_text: Kinetic weapons for taking out targets.
source_ecn_description: Kinetic energy weapon systems specially designed for destruction or rendering mission-abort of a target.

query_text: Documentation and support for our defense products. Certain items have special rules.
source_ecn_description: Technical data (as defined in §120.10 of this subchapter) and defense services (as defined in §120.9 of this subchapter) directly related to the defense articles described in paragraphs (a) through (i) of this category (see also §123.20 of this subchapter) (MT for articles designated as such).

query_text: Gas turbine blades, vanes, and tip shrouds made from DS or SC alloys. These parts offer a stress-rupture life over 400 hours at 1000°C under 200 MPa.
source_ecn_description: Gas turbine blades, vanes or “tip shrouds”, made from Directionally Solidified (DS) or Single Crystal (SC) alloys and having (in the 001 Miller Index Direction) a stress-rupture life exceeding 400 hours at 1,273 K (1,000 °C) at a stress of 200 MPa, based on the average property values;

query_text: Controls mixing chamber temperature.
source_ecn_description: Capable of controlling the temperature of the mixing chamber; and

query_text: Flash hider
source_ecn_description: A flash suppressor;

query_text: Advanced ablative composite materials (silica, graphite, carbon, boron) for rocket, space launch, and missile components like nozzles, nose tips, and re-entry vehicle flaps.
source_ecn_description: Ablative materials fabricated or semi-fabricated from advanced composites (e.g., silica, graphite, carbon, carbon/carbon, and boron filaments) specially designed for the articles in USML Category IV or XV (MT if usable for nozzles, re-entry vehicles, nose tips, or nozzle flaps usable in rockets, space launch vehicles (SLVs), or missiles capable of achieving a range greater than or equal to 300 km); or

query_text: Specialized laser stacked arrays.
source_ecn_description: Laser stacked arrays specially designed for articles in this subchapter;

query_text: Spindle accuracy under 0.0004 mm.
source_ecn_description: Spindle "run out" and "camming" less (better) than 0.0004 mm TIR; and

query_text: Smokeless caseless ammo
source_ecn_description: Caseless ammunition manufactured with smokeless powder;

query_text: Over 100 cm³
source_ecn_description: Exceeding 100 cm^3 in volume; or

query_text: Enclosed workspace separates the user from the work.
source_ecn_description: Fully enclosed workspace where the operator is separated from the work by a physical barrier;

query_text: Over 55W (47.4 dBm) power output in the 2.9-3.2 GHz range.
source_ecn_description: A peak saturated power output greater than 55 W (47.4 dBm) at any frequency exceeding 2.9 GHz up to and including 3.2 GHz;

query_text: Handles 1,000+ kg/hr hydrogen gas.
source_ecn_description: Designed for a throughput of hydrogen gas of 1,000 kg/h or greater.

query_text: Remote control or self-driving.
source_ecn_description: Remote or autonomous steering;
Tris (ethoxyphenyl) bismuth (TEPB) (CAS 90591-48-3).

query_text: Gun barrel drilling machines and drill bits.
source_ecn_description: Small arms deep hole drilling machines and drills therefor.

query_text: Tools and equipment for manufacturing, testing, or maintaining military aircraft and related defense systems. Also includes parts for this equipment.
source_ecn_description: Test, inspection, and production “equipment” “specially designed” for the “production,” “development,” operation, installation, maintenance, repair, overhaul, or refurbishing of commodities enumerated or otherwise described in ECCN 9A610 (except 9A610.y) or USML Category VIII, and “parts,” “components,” “accessories,” and “attachments” “specially designed” therefor.

query_text: Al2O3
Reflows copper for perfect connections, no voids or seams.
source_ecn_description: Reflow of copper (Cu) to minimize or eliminate voids or seams in copper (Cu) metal interconnects; or

query_text: Software for designing, building, and using 2A983 equipment.
source_ecn_description: "Software" "specially designed" or modified for the "development", "production" or "use" of equipment controlled by 2A983.

query_text: Multi-element antennas that electronically steer beams, independently create deep nulls, and switch beams in under 1 millisecond.
source_ecn_description: Antennas, other than Controlled Reception Pattern Antennas (CRPAs), that employ four or more elements, electronically steer angular beams, independently steer angular nulls, create angular nulls with a null depth greater than 20 dB, and achieve a beam switching speed faster than 1 millisecond;

query_text: 0.1-5mm cut radius
source_ecn_description: Cutting radius from 0.1 to 5 mm inclusive; and

query_text: Air filters & air purifiers
source_ecn_description: Air filters, filter networks, or air quality systems;
